title: The Avett Brothers - Live at the Double Door (self-released,2002
description:
If you found this torrent than you probably already know their story, so I'll spare you the bytes. This album is no longer distributed and is found only among the fans who have been with them since the beginning. I share it because it is extremely rare and because it provides an additional layer of depth to the Avett Brothers' artistic development.


		Artist......: The Avett Brothers
		Title.......: Live at the Double Door Inn
		Released....: 2002, (Charlotte, NC)
		Tracks......: 15
		Label.......: Self-released
		Type........: Live Album
		Genre.......: undefined, but Alt-Country is close
		Quality.....: 256kbps, 44100Hz, Joint stereo



		01. A Lot of Moving
		02. Diamond Joe
		03. Sorry Man
		04. Will the Circle be Unbroken
		05. Jenny and the Summer Day
		06. Pretty Girl from Matthews
		07. Avett Brothers Monologue
		08. I'll Fly Away
		09. Let Myself Live
		10. November Blue
		11. My Losing Bet
		12. Gamblin' Man
		13. Cripple Creek
		14. Kind of in Love
		15. Beside the Yellow Line
